definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: That's good. I was just wondering about how to spend my free time on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，我正在想怎麼打發我的週末時間呢？

sentences.english: Great, because I'm applying for my driver's license
sentences.chinese: 太好了，因爲我在申請駕照。

sentences.english: Great, what will my hours and salary be?
sentences.chinese: 太好了。我的工作時間和薪水是多少？

sentences.english: That would be great for JVG. Boost of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，老範會自信滿滿。

sentences.english: Excellent. Now what about tickets and table reservations ?
sentences.chinese: 平共處太好了。票和餐桌的預訂情況怎樣？

sentences.english: Great,we’d better make a booking. It’s quite busy this time of a day.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，我們最好先訂位，這個時間他們生意都很好。

sentences.english: Great. Which celebrities often participate in such events?
sentences.chinese: 這太好了。哪些名人經常參加這樣的活動？

sentences.english: The food was so good that he forgot his weight-watching program and pork himself out.
sentences.chinese: 食物太好了，他忘記了要減肥，開懷大嚼。

sentences.english: Oh, great. Dr. Johnson will be available on Friday afternoon this week.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，約翰遜大夫本週星期五下午有空。

sentences.english: 'How fantastic to be up above ground again, ' said a 27-r-old survivor who was brought up.
sentences.chinese: 一名被救出的27歲倖存者說，能再回到地上太好了。

sentences.english: It's so GREat to see sunshine again after those rainy days.
sentences.chinese: 舊雨之後再見到陽光，真是太好了。

sentences.english: That's terrific. I'm really lucky you were here! How can I thank you?
sentences.chinese: 太好了，我真幸運遇到你，我該怎麼謝你呢？

sentences.english: That would be nice. Could you also get me a pillow and blanket please?
sentences.chinese: 太好了。能請你給我一個枕頭和毯子嗎？

sentences.english: I'm really glad we painted the room this color.
sentences.chinese: 我們把房間刷成這個顏色真是太好了。

sentences.english: Sichuan Restaurant is the best restaurant of Sichuan style in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，四川飯店是北京最好的川菜館。
